name: 1999 Pokemon Game 1st Edition 4 Charizard Holo PSA 9 Mint (0x5530...eaeb)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0x5530ad4c188ff5e371269db8a4738db49bff20bdda602750f8f17342d5fceaeb) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
